anathema: Show or act on emotion, allow a plea for mercy to sway you
edict: Push the boundaries of science and suffering, torture other creatures
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Doloras (Our Lady of Pain)](/Deities.aspx?ID=589)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 320

Perhaps the cruelest of [Hell’s](/Planes.aspx?ID=42) divinities, the Sadistic Angel shares certain characteristics with the [velstracs](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=111) who once resided in Hell— most notably, a drive to inflict physical pain upon living creatures. She does not inflict her torments out of anger or retribution; she practices her art with an unparalleled detachment and absence of emotion. Her followers are sadists, torturers who relish their grisly work, and those diabolists who summon velstracs rather than [devils](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=389). While she bears the title of Queen of the Night and commands power commensurate with the others, Our Lady in Pain is content with her station and holds no ambitions beyond ensuring she can continue her tortures uninterrupted.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Queens of the Night](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=14)

**Edicts** Push the boundaries of science and suffering, torture other creatures

**Anathema** Show or act on emotion, allow a plea for mercy to sway you

**Area of Concern**
Detachment, dispassion, pain

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=42)

**Favored Weapon** [Kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=413)

**Domains** [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=68), [Pain](/Domains.aspx?ID=87), [Repose](/Domains.aspx?ID=116), [Sorrow](/Domains.aspx?ID=117)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Nothingness](/Domains.aspx?ID=114)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=1632)

- **3rd**
[Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=1506)

- **5th**
[Synaptic Pulse](/Spells.aspx?ID=1710)

</column>
name: Doloras (Our Lady of Pain)
